list.abs: It is illegal to display an unclothed mannequin in a store window ., 在商店橱窗展示没穿衣服的人体模型是违法的.
unclose 打开unclothe 剥光unclouded 晴朗的

He unclothed his secret thoughts ., 他暴露了自己的隐秘思想.

entry.tran: 未穿衣服的；一丝不挂的；赤身裸体的
entry.def: If someone is unclothed, they are not wearing any clothes.
